flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600.0>>600.0 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=186>>186 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600.0 - $150 = $<<600.0-150=450.0>>450.0 per head.
He would make $450.0 x 186 = $<<450.0*186=83700.0>>83700.0 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600.0 x 186 = $<<600.0*186=111600.0>>111600.0 at the original price.
He would lose $111600.0 - $83700.0 = $<<111600.0-83700.0=27900.0>>27900.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 168, not 186. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
